backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with player profiles, lobbies, tournaments, transactions, game state types, and storage mixins, serving as the core data model for the canister.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for deploying draft build Version 163 to the live canister, including affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend source files describing their behavior, hooks, UI components, and game logic.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application logic handling identity, admin checks, tabs, quick play flow, and routing between game, lobby, tournament, and wallet sections.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettings.ts: UI for admin settings including live deployment status, system stats placeholders, and house‑cut configuration with nonfunctional backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/BackendConnectiv: Displays backend connectivity status using actor retry hook with connected, retrying, and error indicators.
frontend/src/components/DepositWithdrawM: Modal for deposits and withdrawals with Flexa integration, wallet checks, deposit polling, and status handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GoLiveHelp.tsx: Provides instructions and tips for publishing an app live on the Internet Computer, including link references.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with logo, game mode selector, and wallet connection controls.
frontend/src/components/LivePublishStatu: Shows current site origin, public ICP link, and build metadata with copy and refresh actions.
frontend/src/components/LobbyBrowser.tsx: Lists game lobbies and offers quick‑play options for Spades and Omaha based on game mode.
frontend/src/components/LobbyRoom.tsx: Placeholder UI for lobby rooms, indicating the feature is under development.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Prompts users to create a profile for online or offline mode, saving data locally or via backend.
frontend/src/components/QuickPlayGame.ts: Runs quick‑play sessions for Spades or Omaha, handling state, actions, and game rendering.
frontend/src/components/spades/SpadesSco: Renders compact or full scoreboard for Spades, showing scores, penalties, and hand info.
frontend/src/components/TournamentSectio: Displays tournament info with badges and descriptions that change based on game mode.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnectMod: Provides WalletConnect flow with URI generation, copying, deep links, QR code, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/WalletInstallMod: Shows a modal prompting users to install a browser wallet with quick links to Coinbase Wallet and MetaMask.
frontend/src/components/WalletPickerModa: Lets users choose a wallet type or guest mode, handles connection attempts, and shows errors.
frontend/src/components/WalletSection.ts: Displays wallet stats, balances, transactions, and deposit/withdraw controls depending on game mode.
Provides global Web3 wallet state and actions via React context using useWeb3Wallet.
frontend/src/games/omaha/bots.ts: Implements a simple Omaha bot decision system choosing between check, bet, call, or fold based on game state and randomness.
frontend/src/games/omaha/engine.ts: Provides Omaha game logic including deck creation, shuffling, hand initialization, hand rotation, and action validation like checking and calling.
frontend/src/games/omaha/handEvaluator.t: Evaluates Omaha hands by testing all valid 5‑card combinations and ranking them, including straight/flush detection and tiebreakers.
frontend/src/games/omaha/OmahaCommunityB: Renders a 5-slot community card board for Omaha, revealing cards based on the current street and showing placeholders or a fallback message if cards are missing.
frontend/src/games/omaha/types.ts: Defines Omaha-related types such as cards, players, game state, and helper functions for card formatting and suit color.
frontend/src/games/session/quickPlaySess: Manages unified game session flow for Spades and Omaha, handling user actions, bot turns, and hand transitions.
frontend/src/games/spades/bots.ts: Implements basic Spades bot logic for choosing bids and selecting legal, generally low-value cards to play.
frontend/src/games/spades/engine.ts: Contains core Spades game mechanics including deck handling, dealing, bidding, turn flow, trick resolution, and restarting hands.
frontend/src/games/spades/scoring.ts: Defines Spades scoring rules, nil handling, target score checks, and winner determination based on total scores.
frontend/src/games/spades/types.ts: Defines Spades card, player, trick, and game state types plus helpers for suit symbols and card formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Wraps useActor with connection state, retry tracking, and user-friendly error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity, handling auth client creation, login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, canister build metadata, and Flexa deposit operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuickPlaySession.t: Manages local quick‑play game sessions, including bot automation, bidding, and card play for Spades and Omaha.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletConnect.ts: Handles WalletConnect session lifecycle, connection flow, errors, and balance retrieval.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3Wallet.ts: React hook managing Web3 wallet state, detection, connection flows, WalletConnect sync, and guest wallet generation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup with custom themes, gradients, card styles, scrollbar styling, and dark mode variables.
frontend/src/lib/walletconnect.ts: Custom WalletConnect client wrapper handling initialization, connection, session management, requests, and disconnect logic.
frontend/src/lib/web3modal.ts: Defines Base chain metadata and placeholder config for future Web3Modal integration.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the root component.
frontend/src/utils/icpLinks.ts: Utility functions for resolving canister IDs, generating IC links, and clipboard copying.
frontend/src/utils/sleep.ts: Simple promise-based sleep utility for delaying async actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining content paths, custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, including schema version, features, and tracking information for deployment of a draft build to a live canister.
